title: Tiger's Last Ride?
description:
Mina Kimes and Frank Isola discuss the biggest takeaways from the 2nd round from St. Andrews including Rory and Tiger’s performances, if DeAndre Ayton’s reunion with the Suns will be awkward following his offer sheet being matched, and thoughts on the Texans settling lawsuits with 30 women who have accused Deshaun Watson of sexual misconduct. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Takeaways from the 2nd round of The Open and will Ayton's reunion with the Suns be awkward?
